screen_descriptions.BubbleButtons: Select the buttons to get a response. These buttons can be used to manage contacts.
screen_descriptions.CheckboxAndRadioButton: Click on the items to select. The icons used are Platform specific.
screen_descriptions.LoadingButton: Click on both buttons. Only the active button will trigger an alert. The inactive button is disabled when the status is 'loading'.
screen_descriptions.StyledTextInput: Type in the text input fields. The fields avoid the keyboard. Users can navigate between fields by pressing the return button on the keyboard.
